lines.text: The whole world is turning to shit!
I should kill you for letting him get past you, but I have a feeling I'm gonna need all my men... even a piece of shit like you. Cut off his ear!
I can't see you, I can't hear you. You smell like shit.
My men are soldiers in the United States Cavalry! And they are prepared to die for their country!
With all due respect, sir, you're out of your fuckin' mind!
Do these dead men belong to you?
They just came with the horses.
The closest thing they got in this shit hole, yes.
Aren't you going to wish me luck?
Why don't you go to hell!
What kind of town is this? You got preachers who pack iron!
